resources.string: I found a cool Wikipedia article:

"Thanks for downloading Wikidroid! Here are a few tips to get you started quickly:
To access the search box, press MENU and select Search, or press the hardware Search key on your device (if your device has a hardware Search key.) Change language by pressing MENU, selecting Settings, and selecting the language you want from the Language menu. To bookmark articles, press MENU and select Add Bookmark. You can access these bookmarks by pressing MENU and selecting Bookmarks. You can also add a home screen shortcut to a bookmark - long-press on an empty spot on your home screen, select Shortcuts, and select Wikidroid Bookmark from the list. Select the bookmark you want and it will appear on your home screen for easy access.
Thanks again!"
"Wikidroid 3.0 has lots of new features, including... For even more features, such as saving articles to your SD card, no ads, bookmark import / export and more!"
Could not start selecting text. Contact us at isaac@siriusapplications.com
Do not let the screen turn off while reading articles
Let the screen turn off while reading articles
Export bookmarks in Netscape format to a file on your SD card
Could not export bookmarks. Do you have an SD card in your phone?
Bookmarks saved to WikipediaBookmarks.html on your SD card.
Save page to SD card (Plus required)
"This page has already been saved. If you'd like to save it again, delete it and try again."
The page could not be saved. Make sure you have an internet connection and try again.

"Welcome to Wikidroid 3.0! This version of Wikidroid is much faster, has fewer bugs, and includes some new features, such as:
- Quick Search Box integration - Copy text from article - Fullscreen mode
If you want even more from Wikidroid, check out Wikidroid Plus on the Android Market. It removes the ads from Wikidroid and also can save any Wikipedia article to your SD card for viewing offline!"

"Thank you for purchasing Wikidroid Plus! All of the Plus-exclusive features have now been unlocked.
To save a page, tap MENU > Save page to SD card. To load a saved page or delete a saved page, tap MENU > Saved pages. Long-press on a page to delete it, or tap on a page to load it."
Open home page when starting app
Open blank page when starting app
No application installed could open this link.
Could not load language list. Make sure you have an internet connection.
Add a button to the menu that will allow you to quickly switch between two languages
Will change places with the language above when swap button pressed
The title bar does not scroll with the rest of the page
The title bar scrolls with the rest of the page
Saved pages requires Wikidroid Plus. For more information on Wikidroid Plus, press MENU > Upgrade to Wikidroid Plus.

Sorry, but this home page section is not available on this language. If you would like to see this section implemented for this language, please contact the developers of Wikidroid at isaac@siriusapplications.com.
Please do not close Wikidroid until the activation process is complete.
There was an error while activating Wikidroid Plus. Please make sure you have an internet connection and try again.

Activation was a success; you have been upgraded to Wikidroid Plus. Thanks!
The queue is empty. Long press on a link to add it to the queue.
